Developer Terms of Use
des:
Brut. Skills offers you the latest videos news linear feed, updated on a daily basis.

Only available on specific Echo devices with screen (Echo Show, Echo Show 5, Echo Show 8, Fire TV) and third party screen devices embedding Alexa.

Brut. is a global and committed media that generates positive social dialogue around major contemporary issues. Our editorial line favors the subjects that are important to you: social impact, environment, leaders responsibility, women and minorities empowerment.
